name: technikwuerze
description: Website of the first ever podcast for developers in Germany

scripts.build: pnpm run test && vite build && cp dist/.vite/manifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.release:
gh pr create --base main --head develop --title "Release: merge develop into main" --body "## Summary
-

## Checks
- [x] CI is green

## Notes
- Release tag will be created after merge via Actions."
scripts.release:open: node --input-type=module -e "import open from 'open'; const url = new URL('https://github.com/macx/technikwuerze/compare/main...develop'); url.searchParams.set('quick_pull', '1'); url.searchParams.set('title', 'Release: merge develop into main'); url.searchParams.set('body', '## Summary\\n-\\n\\n## Checks\\n- [x] CI is green\\n\\n## Notes\\n- Release tag will be created after merge via Actions.'); await open(url.toString());"
scripts.test: pnpm run type-check && pnpm run format:check && vitest run
